      • openStream

        public bigt.Stream openStream(int orderType,
                              java.lang.String rowFilter,
                              java.lang.String colFilter,
                              java.lang.String valFilter,
                              int numbuf)
                       throws heap.InvalidSlotNumberException,
                              heap.HFException,
                              heap.HFDiskMgrException,
                              heap.HFBufMgrException,
                              java.lang.Exception
        Opens the stream of maps
        Parameters:
        orderType - - Desired order of Results
        rowFilter - - Filtering condition on row
        colFilter - - Filtering condition on column
        valFilter - - Filtering condition on value
        numbuf - - number of buffers allocated
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        heap.HFBufMgrException
        heap.HFDiskMgrException
        heap.HFException
